category.name: CPD.Bounding Box Update
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Update_CPD_bbox_batch_size
preference.preference_description: Defines the batch size to process bounding boxes in one iteration. This preference value is used by the "mdl0_update_bbox" utility. A valid value can be any integer greater than zero. The default value is 25000.
